channel.title: Rev hunting team
channel.description:
Well since there are so many "pro" 12 year old pkers/clans at revs, i decided to make a Revenant team, strictly MSCP only, and if i dont trust you, you cannot join the team (meaning you have to have been here for a while...). Current members Drubrkletern The Elve Age Rip4d Riku9182 Mihalich Stupit LilXCj Miss Silabsoft Gravenfire#s Marcbob Getting as many people as possible, not everyones on at once :D Rules: 1. No setting up unofficial hunting trips 2. You backstab anyone on the team, you get kicked out, and i will post here that you got kicked out, and why, so other people will watch their backs near you.. 3. If someone gets a rare drop, good for them, but dont just kill them for the drop, you will permanently get kicked out and a personal message from me saying "gtfo", and i will post here that you got kicked out, and why, so other people will watch their backs near you.. 4. You must be in my cc (Official Rev hunting cc) at all times during Official Rev hunting trips 5. Not really a rule, but just letting you know, Lootshare will be on, but not coinshare, so dont worry, since you would get minimum profits from coinshare, the drop is all yours! |||||||||||||||||| This isnt a rule, but dont purposely go on and attack people not in the Clan, you never know they may have a team or something waiting.. and we wouldnt want to get into that unless we need to defend ourselves... THIS IS MEMBERS ONLY Apply here if you want to join
Combat level Hp, Att, Def, Str
Almost forgot (thanks rip4d)
Good weapon (make sure this saves over everything else), dragonhide top and chaps, and an optional shield (try to keep it elemental-chaos or an anti-dragon shield. Something cheap, effective against magic, and easily replaceable). Your inventory can have a super set, and should have 10-20 pieces of food. DON'T FORGET A FORINTHRY BRACE.
Anti-Pk team measures Terms: "Scout" Usually a low level, or someone without a weapon or any armour, standing in the distance watching, or someone just not killing revenants but just watching you. "There is a scout, get your logout buttons ready!" This means there is a scout near by or one was just spotted, and click the X button to log out, but have it ready so you can click "Exit to lobby" quickly, and when this measure is in effect, do not attack anything and wait by the clan, and if you see people rushing towards you, then log out, NEVER FIGHT BACK AGAINST A CLAN! Chances are, you/us will lose. How to tell if someone is a pker: Usually if they are skulled, have anything but black d hide or have mystic on, or a staff are they pkers, and if they rush toward you, but it can be anyone else in disguise, so NEVER keep your guard down. If lets say, i get a VLS drop with the team, and 4 people were there, only lootshare is on, so this is how it goes: 1. I get the drop, the team goes to the ge 2. Sell the item in the ge for the highest price possible (Consult with the team for a good price before selling) 3. Once its sold, split the money equally between ALL members who were at the dungeon, in this example, there were 4 people, and lets say i sold the vls for 40m, so each gets 10m. 4. LOOTSHARE IS ALWAYS ON, SO DON'T TRY TO HOG YOUR DROPS, IF YOU DO YOU ARE PERMANENTLY KICKED OFF THE TEAM! 5. ALL DROPS UNDER 600K CAN BE KEPT BY THE PERSON WHO GOT THE DROP, ANYTHING ABOVE FALLS UNDER THE 4 RULES ABOVE [size=36pt]Our Second trip will be at 4:10 Pm, 4/2/11 (today!!) West Coast time, join the cc "blocked", thats 7:10 Pm East Coast[/size] Current drops: Corrupt d chain: sold for 457k split 76k between the team Glory: dunno :o Corrupt Statius legs: Sold for around 5.6m 1.3m split between us

item.title: Rev hunting team
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I can’t make this trip sadly

Anywho, I’m going to make an account for mscp rev hunting and lootsharing in general. Just post your rsn so I can make sure to add you as a friend.

The reason I’m making this account is for anyone in the community to join and just decide as a group what to do, such as GWD, revs, some other random monsters, etc Just a general Mopar Lootshare. The title will always either be “LS” when lootshare is on, or “CS” for when coinshare is on.

Read full topic

My faggot friend recovered my account and now want’s money for it.
How fucked up is that?
[/quote]Tell him to fuck himself and break his finger in the process. That, and holding a runescape account is pathetic and he should get a life.

That’s what I thought :S
He want’s 35$ PP for it which is absurd… It’s my account…

Shouldv’e made you own acc

What?
I own the account, but gave him the recovery information because I was having no luck…

Beat him up, he’s such a grate friend for holding your account hostage.[/quote]
Bunch of cheap-asshole’s these days’ we American’s are :S
